releaseNotes:
The Chirp GPS staff sends a warm holiday greeting to you and your family, and we sincerely appreciate your awesome feedback. New updates in the latest version of Chirp GPS include:
- A new way to save favorite places
- It’s easier than ever to change avatars
- We’ve expanded the help sections
- Panic alerts now use phone numbers in your emergency contacts
- Locating someone by phone works faster
- Updated chat and messaging between users, including exclusive moody emojis
- Updated mapping to speed up delivery of addresses and distance
- Misc bug fixes throughout the app
description:
Chirp GPS is the leading multi language realtime, location sharing app, for people serious about locating each other reliably. It's the only app to give you multiple core location sharing tools to easily coordinate with family, friends, fleets, and personnel, all in one app. View anyone’s locations on a map including details such as history, battery level, speed, distance, direction, and so much more!

Only Chirp GPS lets you view anyone’s location with full details disclosed about their area, weather, crime, speed, distance, altimeter, address, and more

Here is a list of Chirp GPS features:

* "Best in class" GPS tracking according to App Developer Magazine!
* View the location of anyone on a private map, even if they don’t have Chirp GPS installed.
* Create meet up places and invite friends.
* Broadcast your location for specified time periods
* View location history, speed history, direction, elevation, battery level status, GPS strength, distance, weather, altimeter, crime, regional, and weather data
* Get alerted when people come and go from geo-fence boundaries
* Turn-by-turn directions to anyone you are connected to
* LOCK Chirp GPS and turn it into a dedicated tracking device that can’t be shut off
* Send “panic emergency alerts” to friends, family, or other important people you choose, including those without smartphones
* Private messaging
* Send checked in GPS locations quickly
* Drop pins on map, save and share GPS locations
* Full screen car MAP view with on-screen compass, altimeter, and speed
* Switch between GPS satellite and GPS street views
* Track and follow friends or family across any carrier or device type
* Real-time monitoring of anyones location
* Track multiple people or even everyone at once
* Block individual people from GPS tracking you
* Find out if someone is GPS locating or GPS tracking you
* Send a wake-up ping to someone to have them check in or come online
* Track a stolen or lost phone with high decibel noise
* Best in the industry, always on GPS location tracking with low energy impact you control
* Military grade, encrypted GPS tracking and following with full data output

With Premium you receive location history for anyone in you're following, unlimited alerts, event and meet ups, milage and trip tracker, find peoples location by phone number, create places, pins, and, lock the app from being shut off, weather local crime (US only), and priority support (US only). Subscriptions come with a free 7 day trial. After the trial ends, the subscription will auto-renew on a monthly or yearly basis. You will receive your first charge 7 days after starting your trial. You can turn off the auto-renew for this subscription at any time by going to your iTunes Account Settings. If you do not want to be billed during your trial, you must turn off auto-renew at least 24 hours before it expires.

Disclaimer: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life. 
But our app uses proprietary military-class location aware technology that preserves as much battery as possible.

* A subscription to Chirp GPS Premium is required for some features
• Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
• Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
• Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal
• Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
• Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

Our complete privacy statement is located at https://chirpgps.com/page/127/privacy-policy/

Terms of use: https://chirpgps.com/page/145/Terms-of-Use/
